video.title: Cedar Cove
video.synopsis: Andie MacDowell stars in this drama series based on the Debbie Macomber novel about the life of a municipal court judge in a scenic coastal village.

episodes.synopsis: Judge Olivia Lockhart considers an offer of a federal judicial position, which would tear her away from her beloved small town of Cedar Cove.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When developer Warren Saget decides to tear down the town’s iconic lighthouse, Judge Olivia Lockhart finds her hands tied with no legal way to stop him.
episodes.title: A House Divided

episodes.synopsis: Olivia and Jack embark on their Seattle getaway, but things don't go as planned. Later, Olivia helps an ex-con trying to turn his life around.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: The Beldons must deal with a suspicious death at their inn. Meanwhile, Jack struggles with his relationship with his freeloading son, Eric.
episodes.title: Suspicious Minds

episodes.synopsis: Olivia presides over a messy divorce; Grace must scramble to raise funds for the library when the town council decides to shut it down to save money.
episodes.title: For the Sake of the Children

episodes.synopsis: Justine and Olivia face their fears when Seth goes missing in Alaska; Jack lands a freelance writing assignment covering a Seattle Mariners game.
episodes.title: Free Spirits

episodes.synopsis: Olivia and Jack embark on their Seattle getaway, but things don't go as planned. Later, Olivia helps an ex-con trying to turn his life around.
episodes.title: Help Wanted

episodes.synopsis: The town gets involved in a charity bachelor auction as Justine and Olivia scheme to help Grace and Maryellen land the bachelor of their dreams.
episodes.title: And the Winner Is…

episodes.synopsis: Grace finds herself drawn to two different men as Jack worries about Olivia getting closer to her ex-husband.
episodes.title: Old Flames, New Sparks

episodes.synopsis: As Olivia deals with the news that Jack may take a job in Philadelphia, Grace struggles with what to tell Olivia about the kiss she shared with Will.
episodes.title: Conflicts of Interest

episodes.synopsis: As Jack contemplates taking his dream job far away from Cedar Cove, Stan separates from his wife and returns to town hoping to win Olivia back.
episodes.title: Stormfront

episodes.synopsis: As the holidays approach, Olivia is dead set on going to Philly to win Jack back, only to find out he's back in town unannounced to tie up loose ends.
episodes.title: A New Life

episodes.synopsis: During the holiday season, Justine learns Warren is under investigation by the FBI. Meanwhile, Grace tries to make up for past mistakes.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Olivia recalls her own painful loss when she and Jack comfort Eric at the hospital, and Justine and Seth cope with the fallout of the restaurant fire.
episodes.title: Letting Go: Part One

episodes.synopsis: Eric and Shelley argue about the future of their unborn child, Justine stands up to Warren, and Olivia and Jack come to terms with the past.
episodes.title: Letting Go: Part Two

episodes.synopsis: Grace anguishes over selling her house, Eric and Shelley face money troubles, and Olivia worries about escalating her relationship with Jack.
episodes.title: Relations and Relationships

episodes.synopsis: Grace gets a shock when she confronts Dan, Eric faces tough choices when Shelley leaves with their baby, and Justine tries to help a troubled veteran.
episodes.title: Old Wounds

episodes.synopsis: Olivia helps Grace stand up to Dan in court, and Jack faces a crisis of conscience over a story he is assigned to write about Warren.
episodes.title: Starting Over

episodes.synopsis: Justine struggles to help an increasingly erratic Luke. Meanwhile, Eric goes to work for Warren, jeopardizing his relationship with Jack.
episodes.title: Trials and Tribulations

episodes.synopsis: A new assistant district attorney challenges Olivia in court at Luke's trial, and an old flame reveals unsettling details of Jack's drinking days.
episodes.title: One Day at a Time

episodes.synopsis: Jack faces a crossroads in his recovery when Olivia confronts him about his past, and Justine and Luke fight the feelings growing between them.
episodes.title: Something Wicked This Way Comes

episodes.synopsis: Olivia tries to patch up her professional relationship with Rebecca, and Jack ponders an opportunity to write for a Seattle newspaper.
episodes.title: Point of No Return

episodes.synopsis: Struggling with writer's block, Jack takes a trip to Seattle that jeopardizes his sobriety. Meanwhile, Justine makes a decision about Luke.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies

episodes.synopsis: Eric lashes out at Rebecca over his frustrations with Shelley, and Olivia plans for her and Jack's future, unaware that he is drinking again.
episodes.title: Stand and Deliver

episodes.synopsis: Eric faces serious consequences over his situation at work, Justine reveals her feelings for Luke to Seth, and Olivia demands the truth from Jack.
episodes.title: Resolutions and Revelations
